duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide program (SAP and SCI) security management and oversight of sponsors accredited spaces (SCIF, closed area and SAPF).
Engage with the VP, Operation and Program Managers, FSO, government representatives, and internal/external customers.
Serve as the Security Subject Matter Expert (SME) for the program security requirements.
Manage and oversee all security compliances and maintain security programs.
Coordinate the accreditation of classified information systems in accordance with US government policies and regulations.
Local travel is required (Kingstowne, Herndon and Chantilly).

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Security Management, Intelligence, or a related field (Master's preferred).
